randomnoun common classes 1.0.1 API

The common-public project is a collection of utility classes for use in other projects.

Most classes in this project have entries in the randomnoun blog. These are:

ClassBlog URL
com.randomnoun.common.ExceptionUtilsMarginally better stack traces
Keyboard

com.randomnoun.common.SourceforgeStatsSourceforge Omphalskepsis
XmlUtilExciting things with XML
WindowTreeDomAutomating Windows from Java and WindowTreeDom
Log4jCliConfigurationLogging
MemoryAppenderLogging
VersionServletWebapp versions v1.0
